sentences.sentence: Joy comes from within (don't expect others to work toward your yuletide happiness).
sentences.translation: 快乐源自自我(不要期望别人会为了你的节日快乐而付出)。

sentences.sentence: At one time, though, especially in Europe, one of the classic smells of the Yuletide was Christmas ale.
sentences.translation: 不过曾有一个时期，尤其是在欧洲，圣诞季的经典气味之一当属圣诞节啤酒。

sentences.sentence: In today's drawing American cartoonist Stuart Carlson portrays a typical Yuletide scene with a comic twist.
sentences.translation: 在今天的漫画中，美国漫画家斯图尔特·卡尔森描绘了一个典型的圣诞节期间的场面，这一场面带有意想不到的滑稽变化。
